#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   int n,i,j,cu[100005]={0},cd[100005]={0},r,u,d,mi=100005,ma=0,ans=100005;

   cin>>n;
   r=n/2;
   if(n%2==1)
    r++;

   for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   {
       cin>>u>>d;
       cu[u]++;
       cd[d]++;
if(u==d)
cd[d]--;
       if(u>ma)
        ma=u;
       if(d>ma)
        ma=d;
       if(u<mi)
        mi=u;
       if(d<mi)
        mi=d;

   }
   for(i=mi;i<=ma;i++)
   {
       if(cu[i]+cd[i]>=r)
       {
           if(ans>r-cu[i])
            ans=r-cu[i];
       }
   }
   if(ans<0)
    ans=0;
   if(ans<100005)
   cout<<ans;
   else
    cout<<"Impossible";
}
